subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Four days after blowing a 17-point first-half lead and losing by 2 points at home to Creighton, San Diego State’s men’s team defeated No. 24 California, 64-63.
snippet: Four days after blowing a 17-point first-half lead and losing by 2 points at home to Creighton, San Diego State’s men’s team defeated No. 24 California, 64-63.
